sentence: I had the pleasure of seeing your patient, Donn Emery, in the Internal Medicine recently.
label: Other

sentence: Thank you for your kind referral.
label: Other

sentence: I will summarize his history and physical examination for my own records.
label: Other

sentence: Mr. Emery is a 86-year-old right-handed gentleman who is referred with complaint and electrophysiologic findings consistent with a generalized sensory motor polyneuropathy.
label: Other

sentence: His symptoms began a number of years ago when he noticed bilateral loss of sensation at the tips of his fingers in the hands.
label: Other

sentence: This had extended over several months to include his feet as well.
label: Other

sentence: Over many months to years he has noticed a weakness of his grip bilaterally, which over the more recent period of time encompassing the last year has been worse on the left.
label: Other

sentence: At one time that grip weakness was ascribed to possible carpal tunnel syndrome and he underwent a right carpal tunnel release on the right approximately four years ago.
label: Other

sentence: Three weeks ago he underwent a left carpal tunnel release for these same symptoms.
label: Other

sentence: He has had no falls, but does note some unsteadiness on his feet.
label: Other

sentence: He has had no sensations of tingling or loss of sensory stimulus around his face.
label: Other

sentence: He has had no diplopia, dysarthria, dysphagia, or bowel or bladder complaints that might be related to  neurologic problems.
label: Other

sentence: He has occasional shortness of breath on exertion.
label: Other

sentence: Otherwise, the remainder of his medical and neurologic review of systems is unremarkable.
label: Other

sentence: Past medical history is significant for a past episode of urethral stones, history of lymphoma of unclear type by the medical record but would appear to be non-Hodgkins.
label: Other

sentence: He is undergoing extensive surveillance on a yearly basis for recurrence.
label: Other

sentence: He has a history of prostate hypertrophy, hypertension, and longstanding history of noninsulin-dependent diabetes since the age of 50.
label: mention

sentence: His glucose control by his history has been very good.
label: Other

sentence: He has lumbar back pain, a history of a heart murmur.
label: Other

sentence: Current medications include aspirin, Cozaar, clopamide, Triamterene, Tenormin, and Glucophage.
label: Other

sentence: He has no known drug allergies.
label: Other

sentence: He does not smoke, uses alcohol socially, lives in Juneau South, has no obvious toxin exposure to heavy metals.
label: Other

sentence: His family history is negative for obvious neuromuscular disease.
label: Other

sentence: He had a brother who died in his 50s of some sort of brain infection.
label: Other

sentence: He has several children, all in good health.
label: Other

sentence: On my examination today, he is alert and well appearing, with good concentration, memory, and language function.
label: Other

sentence: No carotid bruits could be appreciated.
label: Other

sentence: The peripheral vascular examination revealed weak pulses in all four limbs.
label: Other

sentence: He had full extraocular motility, with normal visual fields bilaterally.
label: Other

sentence: Pupillary reflexes were intact to both light and near stimulation.
label: Other

sentence: The muscles of facial expression, mastication, and the lower bulbar musculature were intact bilaterally.
label: Other

sentence: Facial sensation was intact bilaterally to light touch.
label: Other

sentence: On motor examination, occasional fasciculations were seen throughout.
label: Other

sentence: There was clear wasting of the intrinsic muscles of the hands bilaterally, and trace weakness at IV+/V by MRC criteria in a symmetric distribution of the hands bilaterally.
label: Other

sentence: Otherwise, muscles of the proximal shoulder girdle, forearm, and upper arm were V/V bilaterally.
label: Other

sentence: In the lower extremities, again, distal muscle wasting was noted, although power in all muscle groups was full.
label: Other

sentence: Sensation testing revealed a moderate-to-severe deficit in vibratory and joint position sense distally in the lower extremities.
label: Other

sentence: Temperature, pinprick and light touch sensation appeared to be intact.
label: Other

sentence: There was no dysmetria on finger-nose-finger testing, and gait was not ataxic.
label: Other

sentence: Romberg was slightly positive with sway but no fall.
label: Other

sentence: Deep tendon reflexes were hyporeflexic throughout.
label: Other

sentence: Specifically I+ reflexes were elicited in the patellar tendons in a symmetric distribution, trace ankle jerks were elicited, and I+ reflexes were elicited in the biceps, triceps, and brachioradialis.
label: Other

sentence: Mr. Emery has already undergone EMG nerve conduction study recently at this institution.
label: Other

sentence: Those results were available for me today.
label: Other

sentence: They are consistent with a generalized axonal sensory motor polyneuropathy, which is moderate in distal extremities.
label: Other

sentence: Both active and chronic denervation changes are seen on the EMG.
label: Other

sentence: There is no evidence for demyelinating phenotype, and nerve conduction does reveal a conduction block at common sites of compression of the median nerve in the wrist, consistent with carpal tunnel syndrome.
label: Other

sentence: Given the apparent chronic nature of Mr. Emery's complaints, an axonal sensory motor neuropathy most likely idiopathic in origin, or more probably related to the diabetes is the likely diagnosis.
label: mention

sentence: With respect to the weakness in the hands, which appears to encompass more muscle groups than would be accounted for by a median nerve compression at the wrist, this is likely the consequence of this longstanding axonal degeneration.
label: Other

sentence: There is no abnormality on the history, examination, or current electrophysiology that would lead me to suspect this is anything more unusual.
label: Other

sentence: In addition to the diabetes, of course the primary concern would be lymphoma-related neuropathy, either related to direct lymphomatous invasion of the perineurium, or more  often as a perineoplastic phenomenon.

sentence: The very chronic nature of his symptoms would argue against this as a likely etiology, and he is, of course, undergoing extensive surveillance for such a recurrence.

sentence: We had the pleasure of seeing your patient Quinten Heath today in Internal Medicine in followup for osteoporosis and hypogonadism.
label: Other

sentence: As you know Mr. Heat is a pleasant 76-year-old man with a history of esophageal cancer status post surgery in 2169, chemotherapy and radiation who had back pain prompting imaging that revealed several vertebral compression fractures and his BMD was consistent with osteoporosis with a T score of minus 4.2 in the lumbar spine and minus 2.3 in the femoral neck.
label: Other

sentence: started zoledronic acid IV in 05/2171 that he tolerated fine.
label: Other

sentence: In addition, we discovered primary hypogonadism with testosterone levels around 45 mg/dL and elevated FSH and LH levels.
label: Other

sentence: We started AndroGel therapy for testosterone replacement and appeared that he is taking every day.
label: Other

sentence: He does not really feel any better or stronger with this medication.

sentence: History of esophageal cancer status post esophagectomy in 2169, adjuvant chemotherapy and radiation therapy.

sentence: Dr. Nunes and I had the pleasure to see your patient, Mr. Christian Mullen, this morning in the office for a routine vascular followup.
label: Other

sentence: It has been nearly 18 months since his last visit here and in the interim time, has been having discomfort involving both of his hips, thighs, and calves.
label: Other

sentence: As you well know, Mr. Mullen is a delightful 69-year-old gentleman with history of hypertension, hyperlipidemia, coronary artery disease, type 2 diabetes mellitus, and peripheral arterial disease who previously underwent left common femoral and left popliteal artery revascularization November 2088 followed by right external, right internal, and right common femoral artery revascularization in February 2089.
label: mention

sentence: Despite the technical success of both procedures, he continued to have bilateral hip claudication symptoms.
label: Other

sentence: When we had last evaluated him in November 2089, we had considered moving forward with CT angiography to assess the patency of his aorto-iliac anatomy.
label: Other

sentence: At the time, he favored moving on a conservative course with improved walking regimen and weight loss.
label: Other

sentence: Unfortunately, despite these measures, he feels quite disabled and limited by his claudication symptoms.
label: Other

sentence: Symptoms are noticeable between 20 and 50 yards distance occurring in the hip area as well as extending down in to his thigh and occasionally the calves.
label: Other

sentence: Symptoms resolve with sitting and resting for approximately 2.5 minutes.
label: Other

sentence: He notes that symptoms will improve with standing still however sitting symptoms resolve much quicker.
label: Other

sentence: He does not necessarily notice any change with inclines or going up stairs; in fact, he is actually able to climb 18 stairs to his office without limitation.
label: Other

sentence: From the cardiac perspective, Mr. Mullen has been free of any symptoms of exertional chest tightness, pressure, or shortness of breath.
label: Other

sentence: We understand that you are following him in closely in this regard and now requesting up coming chemical stress test given that has been nearly 10 years from his coronary artery bypass surgery.
label: Other

label: Other

sentence: -Chest:   Lungs are clear to auscultation bilaterally without any wheezes, rhonchi, or rubs
label: Other

sentence: -Cardiac:   Discloses regular rhythm with a rate of approximately 66 beats per minute.
label: Other

sentence: There is no murmur, rub, or gallop
label: Other

sentence: There are no masses or bruits appreciated
label: Other

sentence: -Extremities:   Reveals 1+ right femoral pulse with audible bruits.
label: Other

label: Other

sentence: Distal pulses are 1+ without any evidence of edema, skin breakdown, or ulceration
label: Other

sentence: Mr. Christian Mullen is a delightful 69-year-old gentleman with history of coronary artery disease, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, type 2 diabetes mellitus, peripheral arterial disease with prior bilateral aortoiliac revascularization here for a vascular followup with symptoms of bilateral hip, buttock, thigh, and claudication.
label: mention

sentence: Mr. Mullen's symptoms at present are suggestive of vascular claudication and in the sense that they are exertionally related.
label: Other

sentence: Interestingly, he has had these symptoms dating back to immediately following his revascularization procedures in 2088 and 2089.
label: Other

sentence: On examination today, his femoral pulses are certainly not robust and may suggest the presence of restenosis.
label: Other

sentence: We discussed with Mr. Mullen the potential of going forward with lower extremity noninvasive studies; however, these revealed supra-normal ABIs in the past secondary to his diabetes.

label: Other

sentence: CT angiogram; however, this would not provide the option of therapeutic intervention if indeed narrowings were noted.
label: Other

sentence: I had the pleasure of seeing Hannah Hendricks in Internal Medicine today.
label: Other

sentence: She was seen alongside my attending, Dr. Heidi Erik-Roy.
label: Other

sentence: As you know, she is a lovely 52-year-old female in whom you have found a left lower extremity bypass surgery.
label: Other

sentence: She comes in today for perioperative risk assessment.
label: Other

sentence: Ms. Hendricks tells me that she has longstanding type 1 diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and peripheral arterial disease.
label: mention

sentence: She in fact has undergone lower extremity bypass grafting in both her left and right lower extremities.
label: Other

sentence: Specifically, she is status post a right fem-pop bypass in 2066 and a left fem-DP bypass also in 2066.
label: Other

sentence: It appears that her right graft has been functioning well, but her left graft was noted to be occluded many years ago.
label: Other

sentence: She comes in now with a nonhealing ulcer and gangrene in her left toe.
label: Other

sentence: You have planned a redo bypass for this upcoming Saturday.
label: Other

sentence: Ms. Hendricks tells me that she has never had any history of coronary artery disease.
label: Other

sentence: She has never had any chest discomfort, shortness of breath, orthopnea, PND, lower extremity edema, palpitations, lightheadedness, or syncope.
label: Other

sentence: She does have a strong family history of coronary artery disease with a brother who had several myocardial infarctions and died at the age of 48 of an MI.
label: Other

sentence: She has a report of a prior EKG with suggestion of an old anteroseptal MI.
label: Other

sentence: She has never had any evaluation for underlying coronary artery disease nor has she had any symptoms referable to CAD.
label: Other

sentence: In terms of her functional capacity, she tells me that up until a year ago, she was doing spinning classes without any chest discomfort or shortness of breath whatsoever.
label: Other

sentence: Because of increasing discomfort in her left lower extremity, she had to reduce her exercise and of late has only been able to do weightlifting without aerobic exercise.
label: Other

sentence: She is however able to climb stairs in her home without any discomfort in her chest or any shortness of breath.
label: Other

sentence: She is unfortunately limited significantly by foot pain.
label: Other

sentence: Her past medical history is as noted above including type 1 diabetes for which she uses an insulin pump, peripheral arterial disease, status post bilateral lower extremity bypass, hypertension, and hyperlipidemia.
label: mention

sentence: Her current medications include aspirin 325 mg, which she started a few days ago, Lipitor 10 mg once daily, Diovan 160 mg twice daily, vitamin C, vitamin B and folic acid supplementation.
label: Other

sentence: She has no clear drug allergies, but does get nauseous and vomiting with Percocet.
label: Other

sentence: She is a past smoker and had smoked for approximately three years, one pack per day in her early 20s.
label: Other

sentence: She works as a Senior Manager of Broadcasting at giant food in Albemarle.
label: Other

sentence: As I mentioned previously, her family history is notable for a brother who died of an MI in his late 40s.
label: Other

sentence: On physical examination, her blood pressure is 135/79, heart rate is 97 and her weight is 137 pounds.
label: Other

sentence: In general, she is very well appearing and in no apparent distress at rest.
label: Other

sentence: She has a jugular venous pressure of approximately 5 cm of water.
label: Other

sentence: She has 2+ carotids with no audible bruits.
label: Other

sentence: Her upper extremities demonstrate 2+ brachial and radial pulses bilaterally.
label: Other

sentence: Her chest is clear to auscultation bilaterally.
label: Other

sentence: Her cardiac exam reveals a regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 and S2, and a soft 2/6 systolic ejection murmur best heard at the left sternal border.
label: Other

sentence: She has no abdominal bruits and no significantly palpable aorta.
label: Other

sentence: Her lower extremity exam is notable for a hyperemic left foot with a bandage, which is covering what is reportedly a gangrenous toe.
label: Other

sentence: Her left lower extremity pulses are 1+ in the femoral, absent popliteal and absent distal pulses.
label: Other

sentence: In her right lower extremity, she has 1+ femoral, with no bruit, 2+ popliteal, 2+ DP and 1+ PT.
label: Other

sentence: An EKG done in our clinic today demonstrates a normal sinus rhythm at a rate of 97 beats per minute with a left axis deviation.
label: Other

sentence: There is left atrial enlargement and Q-waves in V1 through V3 suggestive of an old anteroseptal MI.
label: Other

sentence: There are also Q-waves in lead III and aVF, which raises suspicion of an old inferior MI.
label: Other

sentence: In summary, Ms. Hendricks is a lovely 52-year-old female with longstanding diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, and peripheral arterial disease who comes in today for perioperative risk assessment in light of an anticipated redo left lower extremity bypass graft.
label: mention

sentence: She appears to have an excellent functional capacity up until several months ago.
label: Other

sentence: However, I am concerned by her electrocardiogram, which raises the suspicion of underlying coronary artery disease given the findings of a probable inferior and old anteroseptal myocardial infarction.
label: Other

sentence: As such, I think that it would be wise to better delineate her burden of coronary artery disease by way of a stress test prior to her surgery.
label: Other

sentence: Given that her functional status has been so good up until recently, I do not think that we need to delay her surgery.
label: Other

sentence: However, I would start her on a beta-blocker and as such, I have given her a prescription for atenolol 25 mg once daily, which she will start today and continue up to and beyond the perioperative period.
label: Other

sentence: During the perioperative period, we would recommend that she has tight control of her blood pressure and heart rate with a goal blood pressure less than 120/80 and a goal heart rate less than 60.
label: Other

sentence: I would also make sure to obtain a postoperative EKG to ensure there has not been any changes.
label: Other

sentence: We will try to arrange for an exercise test with arm ergometry and MIBI imaging for tomorrow morning.
label: Other

sentence: If we are unable to do arm exercise, we will obtain an adenosine MIBI.
label: Other

sentence: I will follow up with the results tomorrow after the study is performed.
label: Other

sentence: As I mentioned because her functional capacity is good, I do not anticipate that we will need to make any changes in the surgical scheduling based on the test results.
label: Other

sentence: This is more in order to give us a sense of the underlying burden of coronary artery disease.
label: Other

sentence: It was a pleasure seeing Ms. Hendricks in clinic today.
label: Other

sentence: We are certainly available during the perioperative period if any cardiovascular issues are to arise.
label: Other

sentence: Please feel free to contact me with any questions.
label: Other
